name: Wiown.com
tag_list: social-reality, social-networking, new-start-ups, south-african-start-ups, worldwide-start-ups, technology-start-ups, vc
overview:
Social Reality will be a community that Contributes, Combines and Creates online ideas that will become reality.

Combining conventional Crowd Funding and Social Networking to form a unique, and creative worldwide profit sharing model that will see its members reap the rewards. There are loads of other features you can benefit from, like earning monthly cash incentives simply for bringing new friends to the community.

Its open to all users from across the world old enough to be on other Social Networks and allowed to have a Paypal account. WiOwn.com is especially for those dreaming of one day being on the Forbes 100 List, like minded, and forward thinking.

Lets take the ideas of today and combine them into the future worlds of tomorrow. And, while having fun doing so!

WiOwn, cause its owned by its creators and contributors!

To learn more simply copy and paste this link: http://wiown.com or http://ow.ly/2B3qm

Press contacts: media@wiown.com
